Section.Catchline: “Person in the position of a seller.”

Subsection.Text: A “person in the position of a seller” includes as against a principal an agent who has paid or become responsible for the price of goods on behalf of his or her principal or anyone who otherwise holds a security interest or other right in goods similar to that of a seller.
A person in the position of a seller may as provided in this chapter withhold or stop delivery (s. 672.705) and resell (s. 672.706) and recover incidental damages (s. 672.710).
